input.style: width: 100%; padding: 0px; border: none; margin: -0.0625em 0px 0px; height: 1.25em; outline: none;

div.strong: Coventry Public Schools consists of five schools, serving students from preschool through Grade 12
The mission of the Coventry Public School District is to prepare every student for life, learning and work in the 21st Century.
The Board of Education is comprised of seven community members who meet on the second and last Thursday of every month.
The town of Coventry provides many resources for students and families that help support and enrich our community.
For quick access to the most commonly requested pages throughout the Coventry Public Schools website

div.p: Coventry Public Schools continues to take all necessary precautions to protect our school community from the Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19). In effort to help streamline communications and keep all families and community members up-to-date, we will use this webpage to post any district notices regarding the virus, as well as to share additional, helpful information. Please contact your child's school or the Office of the Superintendent if you have any questions.

div.br:
Below you will find the contact information and a variety of supplemental learning resources sorted by school. Should you have any technical difficulties accessing any of these links, please know our technology department is available to assist during the hours of 7:30 a.m. to 3:30 p.m. To contact the technology department, please use this email address: help@coventryct.org. This address will be monitored every 30 minutes and a response will be given during the stated hours. If you send an email outside of these hours, you will receive an answer back within 24 hours.
Please know, we will continue to send out resources that parents can access to support opportunities for their child to keep their minds active. Again, your patience and understanding during this challenging time are greatly appreciated.

div.p: Dr. Lois Hasty, Preschool and Early Childhood Education Coordinator
